title: Relayer Paths
description: Path metadata to relay packets between two different chains.

path_name.description: A non-dependant name. Usually the combination of two abbreviated chain names. EG: 'hubosmo' which can represent cosmoshub -> osmosis

tags.description: Human readable tag that describes what the path is servicing. E.g. tag 'blessed' is a path that the two chains have comited to maintaining in good health. 'DEX' could be a path that serves deposits to a DEX pool.

chain-id.description: The chain ID of the network.

client-id.description: The client ID on the corresponding chain representing the other chain's light client.

connection-id.description: The connection ID on the corresponding chain representing a connection to the other chain.

channel-id.description: The channel ID on the corresponding chain's connection representing a channel on the other chain.

port-id.description: The IBC port ID which a relevant module binds to on the corresponding chain.

order.description: Determines if packets from a sending module must be ORDERED or UNORDERED.
